channel.title: Portfolios on Diego Valcarce
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Diego Valcarce

item.title: PCA effects on digit recognition
item.description: In this paper (spanish) my collegue and I developed the idea of recognizing digits based on its respective PCA coefficients, concluing what we consider very good metrics (even better than many deep-learning models we tried out).

item.title: Advanced feature extraction for eye detection
item.description: In this paper (spanish) we figured out how different features can skew the results of a machine learning algorithm. We used different features, such as basic statistics measures (mean, deviation…), more advanced ones like contrast, coarseness or even the Hu moments. Finally, we introduce how Zernike moments help the accuracy of the model, as it figures out shapes instead of colors.
